[00:00.00]KOODA (Explicit) - 6ix9ine
[00:02.80]Written by：6ix9ine
[00:05.61]Producer：Koncept - P
[00:08.41]Scum Gang
[00:10.55]Niggas runnin' out they mouth but they never pop out
[00:13.21]I got the drop on your spot everybody watch out
[00:15.85]All my niggas on 50 so you know we hopped out
[00:18.57]Mobbed out opps out we gon' show what we about
[00:20.96]All my niggas really gang bang talk that damn slang
[00:23.72]Rap about it do the same thing let your nuts hang
[00:26.24]We gon' pull up ni**a ¡ándale on sangre
[00:28.89]We post up we don't do the race you gon' die today
[00:31.70]In the spot blow 50 bands sh*t 100 bands
[00:34.30]Sh*t my pockets on a runnin' man f**k a rubber-band
[00:36.79]I'ma f**k her in a handstand she a fan man
[00:39.38]Need the drugs I'm the Xan man I'm the damn man
[00:42.12]I roll up I'm gon' be booted stupid and shoot it stupid
[00:44.71]Brought a knife I brought a Ruger stupid I really do this
[00:47.49]If I tote it then you know I shoot it and I'ma prove it
[00:50.19]Back back don't be movin' stupid or I'ma use it squad
[00:53.01]Dicky stiffy uh bet she give some licky uh
[00:55.60]Lil bitty uh bust all on her titties uh
[00:58.26]She a skeezer uh really don't need her uh
[01:00.90]Bust then I leave her uh she a little eater uh
[01:03.86]Get back kickback blow your sh*t back uh
[01:06.23]Rip that take that flip that send that uh
[01:08.83]223 hit where your clothes at uh
[01:11.53]Scum Gang 'bout that Fendi fin-act uh
[01:14.11]Niggas runnin' out they mouth but they never pop out
[01:16.28]I got the drop on your spot everybody watch out
[01:18.91]All my niggas on 50 so you know we hopped out

[01:24.14]All my niggas really gang bang talk that damn slang
[01:26.90]Rap about it do the same thing let your nuts hang
[01:29.50]We gon' pull up ni**a ¡ándale on sangre
[01:32.13]We post up we don't do the race you gon' die today
[01:35.07]You can talk hot on the internet boy
[01:37.46]That's that goofy sh*t we ain't in to that boy
[01:40.15]Black van pull up to your momma crib boy
[01:42.77]Tie her up drive that sh*t off a bridge lil boy
[01:45.27]
[01:45.78]You can talk hot on the internet boy
[01:48.23]That's that goofy sh*t we ain't in to that boy
[01:50.75]Black van pull up to your momma crib boy
[01:53.31]Tie her up drive that sh*t off a bridge lil boy
[01:55.99]Niggas runnin' out they mouth but they never pop out
[01:58.52]I got the drop on your spot everybody watch out
[02:01.17]All my niggas on 50 so you know we hopped out

data.trans:
[ti:KOODA]
[ar:6IX9INE]
[al:KOODA]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.80]//
[00:05.60]//
[00:08.41]不被理解又怎样
[00:10.55]总有些人废话连篇 不知所云
[00:13.21]我已经对你的路线了如指掌 给你安排了好戏
[00:15.85]兄弟们都是从血帮里出来的 毫无畏惧之心
[00:18.57]随便谁来 都让你们见识到我们的厉害
[00:20.96]兄弟们就喜欢来点刺激的 嘴里再跑点脏话
[00:23.72]用说唱表达自我 嗨翻全场
[00:26.24]我们已经准备大干一场 兄弟们都准备好了
[00:28.89]想要抓到我们 先保住自己的命再说吧 今天就是你的忌日
[00:31.70]当场让你见识到我们的厉害
[00:34.30]我的口袋里放着一张火辣照片
[00:36.79]我要让她臣服于我 对我痴迷
[00:39.38]再来点白粉 我就是王者 唯我独尊
[00:42.12]头有点晕 拿不稳枪了 可能会失了准头
[00:44.71]他们拿刀 我拿枪 我还怕了不成
[00:47.49]我放点水 你也不是我的对手 让你们见识一下
[00:50.19]滚回去 别乱动 我拿着枪呢
[00:53.01]都是我开玩笑呢
[00:55.60]我要让她见识到我的厉害
[00:58.26]她想要的无非是钱 大家都不会当真
[01:00.90]完事之后 好聚好散
[01:03.86]回去好好当你的乖乖女
[01:06.23]收拾好赶快离开
[01:08.83]穿上你的衣服
[01:11.53]随便别人怎么说 我只穿名牌

[01:29.50]我们已经准备大干一场 兄弟们都准备好了
[01:32.13]想要抓到我们 先保住自己的命再说吧 今天就是你的忌日
[01:35.07]小子你也就只能在网上嚣张
[01:37.46]这些把戏我们都不放在眼里
[01:40.15]黑色汽车把你妈妈拉走 你接着嚣张啊
[01:42.77]把她绑结实了 看你还放肆不
